@OP, Battlerite and League are not really the same game. Battlerite has no items, lanes/roaming/pathing, only having 1 map objective in comparison to League's various structure and jungle objectives, not really having snowball etc, it's a straight up arena brawler, and so they require different skills, with some overlap with League. If you find Battlerite more fun, no reason to stop, just keep playing what you enjoy. But I don't find shitting on League, because you enjoy apples more then oranges, fair tbh.

micro: the stuff you do in a fight or other short term scenarios.

macro: decisions that are more long term and taking the whole map into account, like deciding what lane manipulation to do, where/when to rotate, whether or not to contest objectives, etc...

Fun is subjective.  Some people find league more fun, others find battlerite more fun.
